title: Compendium
description: Compendium - the debut novel from Engen superstar author Ellen Curtis is finally available internationally! Read the three shorts that propelled Curtis into "The Tourniquet Revival," "At Midnight, the Dawn," and "Falling into Fire!" Explore the Engen Universe like never before, and even gain early insights into Engen Books' newest series, Infinity. Available now at a special discounted price!
author: Ellen Louise Curtis
